title: Currency symbol
content: Set the currency symbol used by your system.

title: Panel title
content: Set the title of the conversations panel.

title: Database details
content: Insert the database details of the Active eCommerce CMS database.

title: Active eCommerce URL
content: Active eCommerce CMS URL. Ex. https://shop.com/

title: Secret key
content: Get it from the APP_KEY value of the file .env located in the root directory of Active eCommerce.

title: Import customers
content: Sync all customers with Support Board. Only new users will be imported.

title: Import admins
content: Sync admin and staff accounts with Support Board. Staff users will be registered as agents, while admins as admins. Only new users will be imported.

title: Import sellers
content: Sync all sellers with Support Board as agents. Only new users will be imported.
